c74object.name: sjf.AAIM_patternVary~
c74object.digest: Generate variations on a given pattern
c74object.description: Generate variations on a given pattern.

method.name: setBeat
method.digest: This sets the state one of the beats in the pattern
method.description: This sets the state one of the beats in the pattern. e.g. [setBeat 0 1] sets the first beat on, [setBeat 3 0] sets the fouth beat off, etc.

method.name: nBeats
method.digest: This sets the number of beats in the pattern, this defaults to 8
method.description: This sets the number of beats in the pattern, this defaults to 8.

method.name: fills
method.digest: This sets the probability of additional fills being inserted into the pattern
method.description: This sets the probability of additional fills being inserted into the pattern.
